title: 299: Bachelor in Paradise: Ep 6&7 (Liars, “Clout Chasers”, and Rule Breakers - Oh SH!T)
itunes:title: 299: Bachelor in Paradise: Ep 6&7 (Liars, “Clout Chasers”, and Rule Breakers - Oh SH!T)
description:
Well…that was A LOT. Like - A LOT, A LOT. Bekah and Jess are still in shock while recapping the latest BIP episode. They discuss their thoughts on how producers were involved with Brendan/Pieper/Natasha, the massive loss in Brendan’s follower count, supporting Natasha, how it compares with Chris/Alana, the most awkward party in Bachelor history, Kenny’s tired, the reckoning that happened on the beach, and much more!
